description: This file defines a custom tool for getting weather information, creates an agent with a specific language model, and demonstrates the agent's usage by printing responses and adding the weather tool.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of processing prompts and managing tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used by the agent.

methods.name: get_weather
methods.description: A tool function that returns a weather report for a given city.
